H1343.def: = state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans

H1363.def: = state in which a person or object is of great or more than average height; ≈ associated with status

H1346.def: = state in which a substance increases in volume, which manifests itself in an increasing height

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H907.def: = woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3213.def: = action by which humans utter a high-pitched cry to give expression to an emotion, which is usually grief or distress, but can also be triumph and glee

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H2199.def: = action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

H1897.def: = causative action by which humans causes other humans or objects to be removed from their place,◄ as if by blowing them away

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H1612.def: = a creeping plant, which grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils

H3270.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Gilead<SDBH:גִּלְעָד>}, territory of {L:Gad<SDBH:גָּד>}; ► former {L:Amorite<SDBH:אֱמֹרִי>} territory; assigned to clan of {L:Merari<SDBH:מְרָרִי>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; later occupied by {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}

H5189.def: literally: spreading out; hence: = a secondary woody stem arising from the trunk or bough of a tree or the main stem of a shrub

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H5060.def: = process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, whether deliberately or not

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H7703.def: = action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H7019.def: = hot season of the year, opposite of {L:חֹרֶף<SDBH:חֹרֶף>}; ► time when most crops are harvested and preparations are made for the cold season; ≈ sometimes associated with excessive heat and drought, and also with hard work

H1210.def: = pattern of actions by which humans harvest the grapes that have matured and are ready for picking

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H1524.def: mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H3759.def: = newly ripened grain which has just been harvested and which has not yet been dried for storage or for grinding into flour

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H7673.def: = process by which an activity comes to an end

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H3342.def: = large container; ◄ normally hewn out of stone and part of a winepress; ► where the grape juice is collected

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H1959.def: = action by which humans utter loud expressions of joy

H2201.def: = action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

H2809.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with the purpose of achieving something

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3096.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Reuben<SDBH:רְאוּבֵן>}; ► assigned to clan of {L:Merari<SDBH:מְרָרִי>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; later occupied by {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}

H6820.def: = town; ◄ in the south of {L:Jericho<SDBH:יְרִחֹו>} Valley; on south bank of Wadi-Zered in {L:Edomite<SDBH:אֲדֹמִי>} territory

H5697.def: = female young of a {L:cow<SDBH:פָּרָה>}; ► used as sacrifice

H7992.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H4923.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7673.def: = process by which an activity comes to an end

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H1993.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, often associated with animals, but also with natural phenomena like the waves of a stormy sea

H2485.def: = a high-pitched wind instrument consisting of a tube with holes along it, ◄ usually made of wood

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H3502.def: literally: what remains, or is left over; hence: = possessions that one has in surplus over the possession one needs in order to live

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H7144.def: = a hairless patch on the head of an animal or human being in a location where hair normally grows; ≈ this can be a natural phenomenon, as on the head of a vulture, but it can also be created by shaving the head as a sign of mourning

H2206.def: = a growth of hair on the chin and lower cheeks of a mature man’s face, ≈ the absence of which is regarded as shameful

H1639.def: = causative action by which humans cut off (part of) their hair

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H1417.def: = a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army

H4975.def: = the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength

H8242.def: = relatively large receptacle ◄ made out of leather or cloth; ► used for the storage and transportation of food and possibly other objects as well

H1406.def: = the structure forming the upper covering of a building, usually built as a terrace, to which one goes up by stairs

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H7339.def: = central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads

H4553.def: = mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include {L:wailing<SDBH:ילל>}, tearing one's clothes, putting on {L:sackcloth<SDBH:שַׂק>}, covering oneself with dust or ashes, {L:fasting<SDBH:צום>} or eating specific food, {L:cutting oneself<SDBH:גדד>}, {L:shaving one's head<SDBH:קרח>}, covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H2656.def: = state in which humans and deities are emotionally attached to (other) humans

H3627.def: = human-made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2865.def: = state in which the surface of the soil is broken into many pieces

H3213.def: = action by which humans utter a high-pitched cry to give expression to an emotion, which is usually grief or distress, but can also be triumph and glee

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H6437.def: = action by which humans or animals turn their body to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H7814.def: = action by which humans give expression to a friendly attitude, joy and amusement with the gestures and sounds that normally accompany it; ≈ this is normally regarded as a good thing, especially when done with restraint, whereas a lack of restraint is often associated with foolishness

H4288.def: = state in which objects are being broken or destroyed; ≈ often used figuratively to denote difficult circumstances

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5404.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle

H1675.def: = action by which a bird moves swiftly downwards ► in order to capture its prey; ≈ often used metaphorically to refer to an army attacking the enemy

H6566.def: = causative action by which humans spread out an object, such as a piece of cloth, a net, or a document either horizontally or vertically

H3671.def: = part of body; ◄ of bird, insect, celestial creature; ► used for flying but also to give protection

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H3920.def: = action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

H4679.def: = animal hunted by humans or other animals ► for food; ≈ often extended metaphorically to people

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H1368.def: = a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H8045.def: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events completely remove humans, animals, or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

H1431.def: = process by which objects increase in size

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6343.def: = process by which humans tremble or shake, ◄ as a result of a strong emotion of fear and concern for one's safety

H6354.def: = a hollow area in the ground or a rock, ◄ either natural or manmade, ► which can be used by hunters to trap animals, or as a hiding place; ≈ associated with danger

H6341.def: = contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5211.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H5127.def: = action by which humans move to another place in haste, ► in order to escape from a dangerous situation

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H3581.def: = state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

H2809.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with the purpose of achieving something

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H6285.def: = one of the sides or corners of an object

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H6936.def: = upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with "{L:feet<SDBH:רֶגֶל>}" to refer to the whole physical body

H7588.def: = process by which turbulent waters produce a loud and intimidating noise

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H6.def: = state of not being located in the place where it is expected to be

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H7633.def: = a group of people that have been forcibly carried off to prison, into slavery, or exile

H319.def: = pertaining to being located far behind other objects in a row, in a direction away from the spectator; ≈ since the way the ancient Israelites oriented themselves was with their backs facing the East, this term presupposes a westerly direction

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H5002.def: = action by which humans or deities make a prophetic statement; in the case of a deity this is usually done through the mouth of a prophet or seer

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

4.gl: to restore the fortunes (of a nation)
